skills.name: Suppressive Fire
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.desc: Dispels all debuffs on a friendly unit except Bronya, and causes them to take action immediately.

skills.name: Coordinated Reinforcement
skills.desc: Summons Silvermane Soldier or Silvermane Gunner
